relevant_findings.general: Pleasant elderly woman in NAD, A+O x 3
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mild tenderness in epigastrum and RUQ
relevant_findings.extremities: No c/c/e, healing scar right hip, no erythema or drainage

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Heart is upper limits of normal in size, aorta is tortuous. Bibasilar areas of patchy and linear atelectasis with adjacent small pleural effusions, left greater than right.
